dmca.title: [URGENT] Illegal Distribution of Apple Copyrighted Software -- Immediate Action Deman
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ramage, Ian [mailto:IRamage@OMM.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2007 10:17 AM
To: contact@free-codecs.com
Cc: Abuse; Copyright
Subject: [URGENT] Illegal Distribution of Apple Copyrighted Software --
Immediate Action Demanded

 

 

To Whom It May Concern:

We represent Apple Inc. ("Apple").  It has come to our attention that
www.free-codecs.com <file:///\\www.free-codecs.com>  is offering
downloads of a product called "QuickTime Alternative" (hereinafter
referred to as the "Software") in violation of Apple's intellectual
property rights.  The Software is available for download at
http://www.free-codecs.com/contact_us.htm
<http://www.free-codecs.com/contact_us.htm> .  

The Software uses codecs (encoder/decoders) and other components taken
from Apple's QuickTime 7 software.  These codecs and components are
copyrighted by Apple and any unauthorized distribution thereof is a
violation of U.S. copyright law. 

Apple therefore demands that you: (i) cease and desist from offering
downloads of the Software on your website; (ii) remove all links to any
other locations where the Software is available; (iii) delete all copies
of the Software in your possession; and (iv) refrain from violating
Apple's intellectual property rights in the future.  Please notify me by
reply e-mail once you have complied with the first three demands.  Copy
of this notice is also being provided to your ISP, The Planet.  

Apple is prepared to take further legal action with respect to this
matter, and expressly reserves its rights to do so.  If you are
represented by counsel, please provide me with their identity. 

Thank you for your cooperation,

/s/ Ian Ramage 
Ian Ramage
O'Melveny & Myers LLP
Embarcadero Center West
275 Battery Street, Suite 2600
San Francisco, CA 94111
Phone: 415.984.8783
Fax: 415.984.8701
iramage@omm.com

DMCA Certification: I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that I
have a good faith belief that the activities described above are not
authorized by Apple, that the information in this notification is
accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Apple in this
regard.

This message and any attached documents contain information from the law
firm of O'Melveny & Myers LLP that may be confidential and/or
privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read,
copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this
transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply
e-mail and then delete this message.
